casebody.data:
Gregory NIES, et ux., petitioners,
v.
TOWN OF EMERALD ISLE, NORTH CAROLINA. No. 16-1305. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 2, 2017.

Motion of Owners' Counsel of America, et al. for leave to file brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of North Carolina denied.
